abstract: Apple refreshes the iMac and Macbook and adds a new mouse. Is an Apple television next? It could explain a cryptic comment about falling profit margins.
snippet: Apple refreshes the iMac and Macbook and adds a new mouse. Is an Apple television next? It could explain a cryptic comment about falling profit margins.
lead_paragraph: A day after announcing stellar earnings, Apple announced a new line of products, including a new MacBook with a multi-touch trackpad for $999, and new iMacs, with 21.5-inch and 27-inch displays, starting at $1,199.

headline.main: New Apple Macs, Macbooks and a Mouse. But Where’s the Freight?
